description: INSTALATION DE CHAUDIÈRE ET DE VENTILATION DANS LA CUISCINE DE LA SECURE UNIT NIR NOVA
full_summary:
## Secure Unit Kitchen Heat-Ventilation
### Request for Proposal (RFP) ID: WS4380888881

Date of Announcement: 2024-01-04
Tender Closing Deadline: 2024-01-23T14:00:00

**Description:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites bidders to provide mechanical engineering services for the Secure Unit in Building G at the Nova Institution in Truro, Nova Scotia. The proposed work involves upgrade of the kitchen ventilation system to meet National Fire Code requirements and address heat and humidity issues in the kitchen area.

**Scope of Work:**

* Design, supply, and install new ventilation equipment and system
* Upgrade the existing kitchen ventilation system to meet National Fire Code requirements
* Address heat and humidity issues in the kitchen area

**Specifications:**

* The RFP is issued against Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-1560564 Mechanical Engineering Services.
* Bidders must provide a response to the RFP in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.
* Bidders are invited to participate from the Province of Nova Scotia.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Interested bidders must submit their proposal electronically through the Buy and Sell website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/).
* The submission deadline is 2024-01-23T14:00:00.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* The winning bidder will be selected based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Contracting Authority:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact: Grant Stewart
* Email: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Debrief:** Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
